sentences.en: "Can you walk all right?" the nurse asked him.
Are you in love with him?
Dr. Johnson and I have been trying to build him up physically.
sentences.cn: 约翰逊医生和我一直试图增强他的体质。

sentences.en: Friends passed the word that the miners wanted to see him.
sentences.cn: 朋友们传话说矿工们想见他。

sentences.en: He claimed that the businessman had conned him of £10,000.
sentences.cn: 他声称那个商人骗了他1万英镑。

sentences.en: He repeated what she had told him.
sentences.cn: 他把她告诉他的话重复了一遍。

sentences.en: His opponents viewed him as stubborn, dogmatic, and inflexible.
sentences.cn: 他的反对者们认为他固执、教条、僵化。

sentences.en: How very thoughtless. I'll give him a piece of my mind.
sentences.cn: 真是太没头脑了，我要告诉他我很生气。

sentences.en: I can never, ever forgive him. I despise him.
sentences.cn: 我永远不会原谅他。我鄙视他。

sentences.en: I knew it was him as soon as I heard his voice.
sentences.cn: 我一听声音就知道是他。

sentences.en: I'll report back the moment I have located him.
sentences.cn: 我一找到他就马上汇报。

sentences.en: I've had the hots for him ever since he came to college.
sentences.cn: 自从他来上大学后，我就对他春心萌动。

sentences.en: Leningrad was the third alien city to offer him a surrogate home.
sentences.cn: 列宁格勒是他在异地安家的第三个外国城市。

sentences.en: Leshka waved him away with a show of irritation.
sentences.cn: 廖什克恼火地挥手让他离开。

sentences.en: Mitchel's schedule had not permitted him to take time off.
sentences.cn: 米切尔的日程安排使他无法休假。

sentences.en: She walked forward and embraced him and stroked his tousled white hair.
sentences.cn: 她走上前拥抱他并轻抚他凌乱的白发。

sentences.en: She'd half expected him to withdraw from the course.
sentences.cn: 她多少已经预料到他会中途就退出这门课程。

sentences.en: The blame for the Charleston fiasco did not lie with him.
sentences.cn: 查尔斯顿惨败错不在他。

sentences.en: Why don’t you ask him yourself?

trans.tran_cn: (Him)人名；(东南亚国家华语)欣；(柬)亨；(中)谦(广东话·威妥玛)

trans.tran_en: used to refer to a man, boy, or male animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about
used to refer to a man, boy, or male animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about
